title: I Am Dead
description: I Am Dead is a puzzle adventure indie video game developed by British indie video game developer Hollow Ponds, published by Annapurna Interactive and released on October 8, 2020 for Microsoft Windows and Nintendo Switch. It was later released for PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One and Xbox Series X and Series S on August 9, 2021. The game follows the character Morris Lupton, a museum curator on the island of Shelmerston who recently died. Reunited with the ghost of his dog, Sparky, he discovers that a disaster is about to destroy the island. They both must uncover the ancient mysteries of Shelmerston and stop the island's volcano from erupting, saving the island. To do this, the player has the ability to see inside objects and people, revealing their contents and memories.
